name: Vice-Versa
description:
This game is about maintaining balance in the universe 

it is a bit of a fixer upper but this is only my second ever public game

i hope you like it

Instructions:

.the yin collects the white circles

.the yang collects the black circles

.if there are more white than black circles and Vice-Versa then the game will end

.you need to collect the circles to maintain balance
